column1: Little Goat Diner////Our waiter was very friendly and helpful with recommendations
column2: but seemed to forget about our table at times. Prices are fine
column4: I think the sandwiches/burgers should come with fries. Just a pet peeve of mine. I really would like to try the Goat Almighty
column5: which is the colossal goat burger with BBQ pork
column8: and many other toppings. One of these days
column9: I will bring the full power that is my appetite.
